title: Metropolitan Cats
brief_description: Using the splendid collection of drawings, paintings, carvings and sculptures of cats in the New York Metropolitan Museum of Art, filmmaker Robin Lehman takes the viewer on a delightful tour of 4,000 years of cat history.
